page.description: When the 'Genie style' checkbox in the 'Tab/Accordion Control Properties' section is checked, then a number of 'Genie settings' will appear. These settings structure how the genie will appear when the component is run.

section.description: The genie provides an alternate customizable method of moving between the tab panes in a tab control. Rather then clicking on an individual tab to open a given tab pane, users can click on 'next' and 'previous' buttons to move between tabs.
